# Interactive plots {#interative_plots .tabset .tabset-fade}  

Data visualisation is increasingly required to be interrogable by the audience. Consequently creating interactive plots are becoming common. There are several ways to include these but the two most important are user of {*plotly*} and {*shiny*}. 

Although {*shiny*} is covered in another part of this handbook, we will cover some important steps here too that require understanding of {*shiny*}.
